title: All About Space: Astronomer Book 2014
description:
A complete guide to observing the night sky "The Astronomer Book is the perfect guide to viewing the night sky. Discover how to set up a telescope and capture stunning images, and learn where to look and what to look for. From stargazing to viewing planets, comets, meteor showers and more, this book is packed with essential information to help you on your way.

Featuring: Observing and astrophotography - Learn how to set up a telescope, capture stunning images and get some top tips Viewing planets - Uncover the best way to see the unique features of the planets Event-drivin astronomy - Enjoy an eclipse, marvel at a meteor and much more Comprehensive star atlas - Discover where to look for each month of the year

Genre: Magazine
